text: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

translation.en: Or that He would not seize them gradually [in a state of dread]? But indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful
translation.id: atau Allah mengazab mereka dengan berangsur-angsur (sampai binasa).456) Maka sungguh, Tuhanmu Maha Pengasih, Maha Penyayang
